refnamediv.refpurpose: First Unicode character to use, decimal value.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If callout.graphics is zero and callout.unicode is non-zero, unicode characters are used to represent callout numbers. The value of callout.unicode.start.character is the decimal unicode value used for callout number one. Currently, only 10102 is supported in the stylesheets for this parameter.
